242820.short_desc: 140 is a challenging minimalistic platformer with abstract colorful graphics. Rhythmic awareness is required to overcome obstacles controlled by an energetic, yet melancholic electronic soundtrack.

290970.short_desc: 1849 is a city management game set during the California Gold Rush. Your task is to build towns, populate them with workers, and make sure that they are housed, fed, and entertained. You’ll have to manage and coordinate extensive production and trade networks to make sure your towns thrive.

581810.short_desc: 1166 is a psychological horror game following six people in Salem, Massachusetts and how their lives change when one of them is kidnapped…Fight through pain, depression, and grotesque monsters to uncover the truth. The darkness has taken a hold, will you see the light or hide in the shadows?

639650.short_desc: 1982 is a FREE retro inspired blasta-thon that will test your gaming skills to the max.

684210.short_desc: 7 is a puzzle platformer, literally, by the numbers.

696860.short_desc: 900 is a minimalist action score attack game in which the player controls an entity that must absorb universes in order to grow endlessly.

761190.short_desc: 1010 - is an addictive puzzle game with a original storyline

785900.name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms - Deluxe Pack | デラックスセット | 數位附錄套組
785900.short_desc: Bring your favorite bachelors home with this Deluxe Pack that includes a digital art book and wallpapers to decorate your PC and your phone!

814510.short_desc: The world's first digital elimination game, a game combining Tetris and digital elimination, is simple to use, but it is not easy to get high scores. Once you play it, you will be unable to stop!

835720.name: 2260 VR
developers: 珠海心游科技股份有限公司
publishers: 珠海心游科技股份有限公司
835720.short_desc: In 2260, the earth's resources were depleted. In order to survive, the space for human development extends to outer space. In outer space, through the continuous exploration of a team of people and horses, a new resource planet, the holy land, new discoveries have brought new hopes, and the development of human beings is continued.

876840.short_desc: 999 is a puzzle platformer style game in which you must fling your character to the exit through 999 difficult levels. Throw your character around gruelingly addictive, funky, psychedelic, colourful and thrillingly rage-enduing levels and get as far as you can.

913850.short_desc: Help Lily use her imagination to unlock her memories and relive the events of a night that changed her life. Discover what happened and what is 103.

938520.name: Twenty One
938520.short_desc: Twenty-one is a famous card game where you must go measuring and buying cards who get closer to 21 wins, however, if you pass 21, you lost!

942050.short_desc: THE ORIGINAL MADE BETTER | 2048 is a classic puzzle with the simple goal of reaching 2048. Move your tiles around the board – When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

987850.short_desc: 2084 is a fast-paced First-Person Shooter with hacking mechanics. Battle your way through hordes of enemies, hack their minds to gain advantage on the battlefield, and immerse yourself in a riveting short story set in a grim cyberpunk landscape.

1018090.short_desc: Welcome to the year 2100. You have been selected to conduct research on the most advanced space station in all of the history of mankind with the most advanced AI. However, things start to take a turn for the worse when the AI begins to turn against you.

1028160.short_desc: Strange things are happening. Time to send tweets and kick @$$! And we're all outta WiFi. Take on hordes of enemies in this terrifying First-Person Shooter with an immersive and creepy atmosphere.

1043350.short_desc: The story of the writer Mike Williams, a specialist in paranormal phenomena, he is sent to the dead city of Centralia to search for inspiration, to finish writing your book on the paranormal.

1063230.short_desc: The history of the driver, Alexander Rasputin, he goes on an internship to manage the train, and enters the paranormal world with his mentor. You have to uncover the secret of the train 6120, and its passengers!

1081800.short_desc: A simple puzzle game. Place 3D blocks in virtual reality and clear lines to earn points. How high of a score can you earn?

1118070.name: 1976 - Back to midway
1118070.short_desc: Are you ready to travel back in time to 1943 and relive the excitement of classic arcade dogfights? Now, thanks to Virtual Reality, you’re about to discover a new level of immersion and spectacularity, while retaining the original essence and fun.

1140110.short_desc: Engage in deadly shootouts with a diverse arsenal of weaponry in this fast competitive online FPS. The objective: Get the encrypted data back to the source. Find the encrypted key and activate the data SLOT, a pyramidal dock with the power of sending the data back to ATMOS.

1155510.short_desc: The year is 9001. Humanity has spread across the stars. While the masses suffer in absolute poverty, the wealthy elite use their incredible resources to genetically engineer themselves into something more than mere mortals. The galaxy is now ruled by these tyrants. Can you defeat them?

1207860.name: Brick Blaster
1207860.short_desc: Brick Blaster is a classic brick breaking game with 100 levels to complete, power-ups to grab, and bosses to defeat!

1263680.short_desc: YOU ARE A SQUARE. That can fight, drink, dance, lift, become an athlete, play darts, fight robots, rob, steal, and smoke weed. All to get the global high score.

1269370.short_desc: 171 is an open world action adventure game with a Brazilian inspired ambience.

1372670.short_desc: Life is short. Time is precious. Can you discover and solve the mysterious sequence of puzzles that will save the world before you are... eighty-sixed?

1397010.short_desc: Welcome to the 1980s! This is a city which just started to develop, and you're in charge of this small urban village. How will the city's future be tied to this place? Manage your land, construct new buildings, explore the stories, and find out the ultimate fate of this urban village!

1512520.short_desc: It's a nice puzzle to move the same numbers next to each other.

1544860.short_desc: Climatic side scroller where history plot intermingles with Slavic legends, Second World War, and paranormal activity. Solve complex puzzles, do some platforming, interact with various characters, discover their unclear motives, and be a part of the dark and forgotten mystery.

1593280.name: 8089: The Next Action RPG
1593280.short_desc: 8089 is a fully featured, open world procedural action RPG with randomly generated enemies, items and quests. Customize futuristic weapons with endless combinations in this fun game that doesn't take itself too seriously! VR is fully supported, but not required

1752890.short_desc: ONLINE sci-fi Multiplayer ZOMBIE game.It's 2030 AC, Beings from planet Venus are back and they declare WAR to humans with a deadly virus. Use ultimate military weapons, make body parts fly, clear the area from deadly hordes, Great amount of action to play alone or with at least 4 friends.

1795830.short_desc: "2021" is an interesting and innovative small game, simple operation, just use 4 digital keys to control the ball, think carefully, make a reasonable jump in a random scene, reach the end to finish the game.Tired of playing big works, you might as well calm down to enjoy this different small game.

1798300.short_desc: 本遊戲以日治時期的小說家、影人劉吶鷗生平為故事文本，以臺灣文學館收藏劉吶鷗的麻將牌為關鍵道具，遊戲舞台從上海百樂門、天津萬國橋、黑龍江大興安嶺、北京明陵地宮到臺灣臺南州廳。在科幻背景中，使玩家進行一場益智解謎遊戲。

1830480.short_desc: COLLECT MEMBERS!ENFORCE YOUR MEMBER!MAKE YOUR OWN RAIDER!

1851090.short_desc: Immerse yourself in an emotional and intriguing narrative adventure video game about the awakening of a country.

1915990.short_desc: Discover who you really are on an adventure where choices matter and accuracy is paramount.

1987630.short_desc: Psychedelic 3D maze-runner. Each level is more difficult than the last one. Fight an onslaught of enemies as you try to find your way to the center of the island. You play as a revenant, avenging your death, and trying to free your sister from prison.

2010310.short_desc: Join 369 in an adventure full of excitement and fear and find your way through a dangerous labyrinth by destroying demonic creatures and solving various puzzles. 369 takes you with it and plunges you into the depth of a story full of excitement, apprehension and fear and shows you the way of life

2013120.short_desc: Detective visual novel about mysteries of rural Russian town in 90-s, anime style.

2134360.short_desc: 89 is a simple platforming game that features a small twist, there is only one checkpoint in the whole game, located halfway through the game. It features straightfoward level design, 1-bit pixel art graphics and controls that are simple and intuitive.

2147580.short_desc: 1990 is a fun, casual RPG with turn-based combat.

2203800.name: Bad Santa
2203800.short_desc: Bad Santa is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about the girl Florance, who broke up with her boyfriend. She hasn't had sex in a very long time. And for Christmas she asked Santa to come and fuck her! Her wish came true!

2329470.short_desc: Point-and-click RPG full of puzzles and tough enemies. You can decide to be good or bad in the game. Your decisions will define your future. Use your items wisely or suffer the consequences. “While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.” - Leonardo da Vinci

2390780.short_desc: 1984 is a first-person survival adventure set in Orwell's timeless dystopia. As Winston Smith you must carefully plot your secret rebellion against Big Brother, while avoiding the suspicions of the Thought Police. Adaptation by the Narrative Designer of Subnautica, Talos Principle and FTL.

2542430.short_desc: Each time you press the button, it will either double or lose all the points you’ve put in. How much will you risk?

2593030.short_desc: Old-skool FPS gameplay with modern graphics and extra horror 😱 Chainsaw 🪚 Double Barrel Shotty 🛢️🛢️ Flamethrower 🔥 Evil magic powers 😈 Slay your way through three episodes: A blackops gov site on the surface ⛺ An underground lab ‍🔬🧟, and finally.. You're going straight to hell. Wishlist 666.

2742840.name: Saturn
2742840.short_desc: Saturn is a tactical RPG set on the moons of Saturn and on Earth. The protagonist controls robots on the moons of Saturn and explores an underground city where one can find keys to the secrets of deep space.

2743370.name: Tentacles Party With Nuns Soundtrack-Theme Songs
2743370.short_desc: Tentacles Party With Nuns Theme Song (Vocals) Contains op/videos with subtitles

2743380.name: Meow Moments: New Year Activity Book
2743380.short_desc: Enjoy a lovely book in a printable PDF file with activities to relax, featuring New Year illustrations from "Meow Moments: Celebrating Together". Let's remember the New Year celebration! Plus: unlock an extra minigame in the main game.

2743410.name: The Echo Paradox
2743410.short_desc: The Echo Paradox is a first-person psychological horror game. Humanity stands on the brink of an unsettling revelation – alternate dimensions are real, but eerily without signs of life.

2743420.name: Warlanes
2743420.short_desc: Experience the fusion of WWII action and strategic MOBA-style gameloop. Lead your troops in third-person shooter battles, guide them down their lanes, and siege the enemy base in a war-torn landscape.

2743430.name: Brick Blaster
2743430.short_desc: Gather your weapons and blast your way through the bricks in this new twist to the classic brick breaking genre. Test your dexterity and aim as you wreak havoc on waves of defenseless bricks.

2743470.name: Ukraine Total Defense
2743470.short_desc: Ukraine Total Defense is a tower defense game about the Ukraine war.

2743560.name: RPG Maker 3D Character Converter - SD-VRM 2
2743560.short_desc: This software is a collection of VRM data assets created to meet the specifications of "RPG Maker 3D Character Converter." It includes various types such as fantasy, realistic, and professional characters in VRM format.

2743570.name: Apex Heroines - Tied Love 结绳束爱
2743570.short_desc: This DLC contains the following contents: 1. A set of skins for the main character Aurora - Tied Love Ps: This dlc is a skin, there will be no numerical strength enhancement, please browse the store map in detail and buy according to your own preferences.

2743610.name: Winning Post 10 2024 体験版
2743610.short_desc: 時代を超える、優駿となれ。競馬シミュレーションゲーム「ウイニングポスト」シリーズ最新作！ 美しきサラブレッドたちによる大迫力のレースシーン。超満員のスタンドに鳴り響く大歓声。興奮渦巻く空前の競馬ブームがいま、到来する。

2743630.name: Cut the Cards
2743630.short_desc: Create your own cards in this roguelike deckbuilder by cutting and pasting throughout your deck! Play your customized cards in text-based events and card battles. Journey through an epic medieval fantasy world, making do with limited resources.

2743640.name: Apex Heroines - Spring Sakura 春日樱花
2743640.short_desc: This DLC contains the following contents: 1. A set of skins for the main character Aurora - Spring Sakura Ps: This dlc is a skin, there will be no numerical strength enhancement, please browse the store map in detail and buy according to your own preferences.

2743680.name: Apex Heroines - Game Grape	电玩葡萄
2743680.short_desc: This DLC contains the following contents: 1. A set of skins for the main character Aurora - Game Grape Ps: This dlc is a skin, there will be no numerical strength enhancement, please browse the store map in detail and buy according to your own preferences.

2743690.name: Scene Investigators - The Making of Scene Investigators
2743690.short_desc: This content requires the base game Scene Investigators on Steam in order to play.

2743840.name: SHADOW TRACER
2743840.short_desc: "SHADOW DETECTIVE" is a first-person 3D horror adventure game for solo play where you can enjoy exploration and scenarios to find the cause of supernatural activity while protecting yourself from ghosts at a high school during the night.

2743860.name: TSEROF
2743860.short_desc: Find hidden puzzle pieces and find the secret of a Charlotte who lost her memory.

2743960.name: 英雄与霸主 Heroes and Overlord :Prologue
2743960.short_desc: This is a fantasy rogue-like game , you select a faction from the Alliance, Orcs and Undead（The Demons is in full version，not in this Prologue version), assemble your heroes and armies to conquer the land.

2744000.name: Surmountable
2744000.short_desc: Your ship is shot down while engaged in a space battle. You land on an unknown planet. With your battleship damaged and no way of contacting your mother ship, you must survive on the planet until you find a way back home.

2744010.name: Urban Jungle
2744010.short_desc: Turn your home into a green haven in Urban Jungle. Find the best place for each plant in your tiny apartment and enjoy gardening without worries. And don't forget to pet the cat!

2744030.name: Zero Hour - Aesthetics Pack "Serpentine"
2744030.short_desc: This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

2744070.name: Eternal Burden
2744070.short_desc: A puzzle platformer in which you play as William, a restless soul trying to go back in time to get rid of his burdens, symbolized by a metal ball chained to his body. Use the ball to your advantage to get over obstacles and to solve the physics based puzzles that block your path to liberation.

2744100.name: Pokini Kagura
2744100.short_desc: Parkour around an abandoned city defending cute animals from evil monsters. Style on the baddies with expressive shmovement and customizable combos. Rebuild your hometown with the help of your friends and relax in a soothing hot spring.

2744130.name: Blister Blight
2744130.short_desc: A robot assassin fuses with a noble mechanic. Take the role of Blister Blight as you confront your fellow rulers of Ridgescar. Repair or destroy? Wreck or Reform? The Blights await their fate!

2744220.name: Solar Quiz VR
2744220.short_desc: The educational app Solar Quiz VR will introduce you to the planets of our Solar system in virtual reality mode in the format of an entertaining quiz.

2744260.name: The Zhukov Line
2744260.short_desc: A short one-room-horror which takes place on a livestock train in a dystopian Soviet state

2744300.name: Solaria
2744300.short_desc: Guide your city from fledgling solarpunk community to futuristic metropolis, one tile at a time. Watch your citizens survive and thrive. Solaria is a minimalist, solarpunk city builder where the city builds itself!

2744310.name: Potato Arena Demo
2744310.short_desc: Smash! Smack! Kick! Blow up! Burn! Beat! Boil! potatoes. Potato Arena is a 1-4 player local and online multiplayer party game. Fight and Compete as your own custom potatoes to win several different minigames against your 3 friends. Play football, Fish Slap, Sumo wrestle. Fight your friends!

2744320.name: The Stalked Demo
2744320.short_desc: Escaped from Liam's obsession, Kate seeks refuge in her grandpa's mansion. Strange occurrences raise questions about Liam's presence or another figure. Unraveling mysterious letters, Kate embarks on a journey, seeking peace.

2744340.name: Thunder Ronin
2744340.short_desc: Thunder Ronin is a samurai souls-like boss rush. on your way to take revenge on your familty. slash, deflect, and dash through powerful foes. fighting in ancient japan between sakura trees and the glow of the moon.

2744350.name: Tutor X Hypnosis 2
2744350.short_desc: The main character is given a hypnosis device. The goal is to hypnotize his sisters, who have been abusing him for a long time, to manipulate them as he wishes and train them to become the women of his choice.

2744380.name: CockHero Battle Rookie
2744380.short_desc: Delve into the immersive experience with your sugar mommy Peni, who is waiting for her boyfriend. Meanwhile she practices her huge dick for an upcoming cockhero battle with her boyfriend as he returns. Find out about her relationship as the game progresses into something naughty and horny.

2744390.name: The Dawning Clocks of Time Remake
2744390.short_desc: A story of love, war and betrayal on an intergalatic scale. A epic third person shooter with both sandbox and linear story progression. Take up arms and battle for the ages, who will decide the fate for all of humanity? Now remade in HD / 4K with cinematic presentation.

2744450.name: A Weekend Trip
2744450.short_desc: A point-and-click adventure about a trip with friends over the weekend. Help your friends, explore the place, hang around or just enjoy the scenery. Decide what River does during this trip.

2744460.name: Run and Gun 2: Opossum City Playtest

2744470.name: Cards and Creatures
2744470.short_desc: Enhance your strategy and strengthen bonds with your creatures in this card battling, creature collecting roguelike. Cards and Creatures skilfully blends different genres into one addictive package!

2744510.name: Abstracto
2744510.short_desc: Abstracto is a Retro-Inspired, Hack N' Slash, Combat-Oriented Platformer, with a deep combat system that lets you play your way. Play as Forte a blue square on a quest to defeat the evil Immotus and save the strange land of the Abstract.

2744540.name: Heretic's Fork: Inside The Fire
2744540.short_desc: Dive 'Inside the Fire' with Disturbed: 7 Exclusive Character Variants and 4 Electrifying Tracks from 'Indestructible'!

2744550.name: Estellina
2744550.short_desc: Just you, the track, and the thrill of the chase

2744590.name: My Lovey-Dovey Demon Adult Patch
2744590.short_desc: Free 18+ DLC for My Lovey-Dovey Demon.

2744610.name: Happy Lab: Cybernetic Carnage
2744610.short_desc: Expansion that takes your Happy Lab experience to a whole new level of intensity! Unleash chaos and explore uncharted territories with the addition of two thrilling features: the Gore Mode and the Unlimited Money Free Mode.

2744620.name: Gamebox
2744620.short_desc: Gamebox is a free and open source sandbox game centered on user generated content. You decide what you want to play, be it in 3D or 2D, single-player or multiplayer, or create and upload your own games.

2744630.name: SteamWorld Build Mechanized DLC
2744630.short_desc: SteamWorld Build Mechanized DLC introduces you to your new best friend, The Mech! Explore and manage new mines and solve more puzzles with your new not so little buddy. But be ready to construct your defences to beat the Abominations!

2744640.name: Shotgun Chicken
2744640.short_desc: Shotgun chicken is a Foddian Precision Platformer Where you use your trusty old shotgun to make it back to the chicken coop but just one wrong move can send you tumbling down to the bottom.

2744650.name: The Moon 2044
2744650.short_desc: Explore a secret NCIS facility and discover its dark secret. Take on the role of the XV-11 unit and face hundreds of enemies in a dark sci-fi shooter inspired by old school hits!

2744670.name: Capital Dilemma
2744670.short_desc: Navigate corporate chaos in this minimalist management game. Swipe to make decisions, increase your stock price, and balance metrics to stay in power.

2744720.name: Weapon Devourer
2744720.short_desc: Weapon Devourer is a psychological horror game with souls-like and 1930's cartoon vibes, blending subtle puzzles. Battle sentient weapons, dodge their attacks, metamorphose into a fearsome entity to overcome powerful challenges, and synthesize mighty combinations by diving into the Shield's belly.

2744730.name: Cogstellation
2744730.short_desc: Cogstellation is a space mining game based entirely around connecting gears around. Improve your ship to be the space travel machine that you know it can be, colonize the solar system by defeating the existing colonies, and improve your base with the best mining and crafting equipment you can get.

2744750.name: Last Epoch - "Golden Guppy" the Baby Chronowyrm
2744750.short_desc: Have your buddy Guppy join you on your adventures through Last Epoch with this exclusive cosmetic pet! The "Golden Guppy" Baby Chronowyrm is a pre-order exclusive cosmetic pet available to everyone who owns a copy of Last Epoch prior to the release of 1.0 on February 21st.

2744760.name: Last Epoch - 100 Epoch Points (EP)
2744760.short_desc: A bonus amount of Last Epoch’s in-game currency, Epoch Points (EP) for you to spend on additional cosmetic items!

2744770.name: Last Epoch - Adolescent Chronowyrm
2744770.short_desc: The Adolescent Chronowyrm is a Cosmetic Pet that can join you on your Travels.

2744780.name: Last Epoch - Fallen Ronin
2744780.short_desc: The Fallen Ronin armor set is a unique cosmetic armor set available to be equipped in Last Epoch

2744790.name: Last Epoch - Firefly's Refuge
2744790.short_desc: The Firefly’s Refuge is a unique in-game portal effect that you can use to replace the visual look of your character's town portal!

2744800.name: Last Epoch - Temporal Guardian
2744800.short_desc: The Temporal Guardian armor set is a unique cosmetic armor set available to be equipped in Last Epoch and provides only a visual change.

2744810.name: Last Epoch - Twilight Fox
2744810.short_desc: The Twilight Fox is a unique pet cosmetic that can join you on your journey through Last epoch.

2744820.name: Last Epoch - Adult Chronowyrm
2744820.short_desc: The Adult Chronowyrm is a fearsome partner to have join you on your quests through Last Epoch!

2744830.name: Last Epoch - Celestial Way
2744830.short_desc: Travel through time in style with the mysterious Celestial Way portal.

2744840.name: Road Toad
2744840.short_desc: Embark on a whimsical journey with Road Toad, a charming arcade adventure featuring a goofy toad navigating minimalist landscapes, collecting power-ups, and facing quirky challenges.

2744860.name: Coloring Pixels - Space 2 Pack
2744860.short_desc: Space 2 BookThis Space-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Take to the stars with this scientific book, as each image is inspired by everything out of this world!Grab your telescope and see what's beyond the atmosphere.

2744900.name: Detective Kiwi
2744900.short_desc: "Detective Kiwi" is a free to play multiplayer puzzle game that designed up to 6 players, featuring a simple rule: There will be 4 images every round. You need to find them as fast as you can.

2744930.name: Flee or Be
2744930.short_desc: Start a long journey where every choice shapes your fate. This is a world of suspense and survival, where decisions are your lifeline. And discover the unexpected power of independence.

2744950.name: Dad's Coming Demo
2744950.short_desc: Meet Dad's Coming, a fast paced co-op game about cleaning up your mess before your parents come back home! Help Kate and Bob cooperate to get items across rooms and hazards to get rid of the mess in time! Careful not to break anything and be aware of Jack, a kitty that loves knocking things over!

2744970.name: Friendly Snowball
2744970.short_desc: Friendly Snowball is a fun multiplayer PVP ball game to enjoy with friends.

2744980.name: Puppeteer : Control Doll#2
2744980.short_desc: Find the Christmas tree in the dollhouse and take Christina to the sublunary world.

2745000.name: Snowpult
2745000.short_desc: Frosty Cookie clicker with a mad dash of ice cold humour, hit the targets by slinging snowy balls of fury and hope the games narrator isn't awake to mock your failures.

2745020.name: The Art of Changeling Tale
2745020.short_desc: The official Changeling Tale digital art book.

2745030.name: The book by the blue
2745030.short_desc: in this First-person horror game you will be discovering what's going on with missing persons and a corrupt scientist. Find items littered around to access locked doors and secret passages.

2745040.name: Polismos
2745040.short_desc: In Polismos you build and manage cities in the ancient Greek world. To ensure your city's prosperity you will need to care for your people, trade valuable resources, enact wise policies, and maybe even dominate other cities.

2745050.name: Flow Factory
2745050.short_desc: Flow Factory is a physics-based factory automation game. Tinker with complex production lines, make them faster and more efficient. Deal with freely floating pieces and defy gravity. Build, research, optimize. Relax and enjoy everything running smoothly.

2745080.name: We Need More Steam!
2745080.short_desc: We Need More Steam! is about strategizing and creating as much electricity as possible for a town's people always demanding more!

2745090.name: Elf Kicker
2745090.short_desc: Punch and kick Santa's elves through a winter themed backdrop with relaxing Christmas music.

2745120.name: Scythe Machine
2745120.short_desc: A fast-paced sci-fi / fantasy multiplayer action roguelike that requires balancing PvE with PvP. Use augments to gain new abilities and get stronger as you navigate your way from chamber to chamber to reach the end and take control of the Machine.

2745140.name: Failed Trust
2745140.short_desc: In "Failed Trust", you explore a mysterious technical center where you are sent to retrieve important documents. Immerse yourself in the world of technology, collect energy and solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of this mysterious place.

2745150.name: Wheel Saint: Hellride
2745150.short_desc: Wheel Saint: Hellride is a rogue-like race through purgatory to rescue lost souls! Drive your car through neverending waves of demons, find lost souls and upgrade your ride!

2745180.name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator - DLC 01: Scapegoath Science
2745180.short_desc: "Scapegoath Science," the first DLC for Gloaming Comedian Simulator, plunges Barry Sazou into a comically chaotic world of the Mad Scientist. Survive another weekend in Transylvania making your way out of cheer jokes.

2745200.name: TERMINAL22 Soundtrack
2745200.short_desc: The original soundtrack for TERMINAL22 made by DHMelon.

2745210.name: Lasertron Demo
2745210.short_desc: Arkanoid with optic-styled physics and different bonuses. Lasertrons can be reflected, refracted, decompose into a spectrum of lasertrons, and change their colors. Clean the playing field with lasertrons!

2745230.name: Card Fencer
2745230.short_desc: Journey through distant lands, collect cards to defeat your enemies, and discover other powerful treasures along the way in Card Fencer, a deck building turn-based RPG.

2745240.name: Scene Investigators Soundtrack
2745240.short_desc: This is additional content for Scene Investigators, but does not include the base game.

2745250.name: Bad Santa
2745250.short_desc: Solve puzzles and collect presents all while avoiding the big bad santa. Also watch out for whatever lurks in the basement.

2745260.name: Swashbuckler's Xmas
2745260.short_desc: An action-packed holiday adventure full of pirates, snowballs, and the occasional yeti. Explore the North Pole in this third-person action adventure game for all ages.

2745330.name: Further Education
2745330.short_desc: Further Education is a visual novel set in 80s inspired world, mainly in a divided USA where choices matter. Take on mind bending cases, collide with world powers and combat your inner demons - in hopes of becoming a better son, a better friend and ultimately - a better person.

2761160.short_desc: A horror visual novel about urban legends of Russian town in 2007.

2761830.short_desc: In this 2D pixel RPG, 24 navigate battles, puzzles, and quests in a war-torn world devoid of color. Your choices dictate the non-linear plot, with multiple endings and an open world hanging in the balance. Will you bring back color as the savior or succumb to darkness?

2763480.name: 生物召唤：对决时刻 Playtest
